sentences.english: Heir of salvation, purchase of God, born of his Spirit, washed in his blood.
sentences.chinese: 爲父神後嗣，已得救贖，從聖靈得生，寶血洗淨。

sentences.english: As the writer states, we are being treated as heirs or sons of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 正如作者所述，我們被接納爲天國的兒女和後嗣。

sentences.english: If the king had no male heir, he inherited by the eldest daughter or their heirs.
sentences.chinese: 如果國王沒有男性後嗣，便由長女或其後嗣繼承。

sentences.english: If the king had no male heir, he inherited by the eldest daughter or their heirs.
sentences.chinese: 如果國王沒有男性後嗣，便由長女或其後嗣繼承。

sentences.english: Heir of salvation, purchase of God!

definition: to bring honor to one's ancestors and benefit future generations (idiom)
to strengthen moral ties between people/to have sexual intercourse (of a married couple)
Second Sage, traditional title of Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] in Confucian studies
work or plans left as a legacy/the views of the departed/posthumous orders or teachings
honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
